author: Luca Missaglia
description: Bergamot liqueur and grapefruit juice combine beautifully and while a tasty aperitivo this combo is best served with breakfast.
name: Garibaldicus
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
